TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An alternative therapy that is being studied as a treatment for pancreatic cancer. It includes a special diet, nutritional supplements, pancreatic enzymes, and coffee enemas.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "régimen de González"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Terapia alternativa en estudio como tratamiento del cáncer de páncreas. Comprende un régimen alimentario especial, suplementos nutricionales, enzimas pancreáticas y enemas de café.
